org.drip.product.option

Class OptionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.product.definition.Component
      • org.drip.product.definition.CalibratableComponent
        • org.drip.product.option.OptionComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentMarketParamRef
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDSEuropeanOption, FixFloatEuropeanOption, FRAStandardCapFloor, FRAStandardCapFloorlet

    public abstract class OptionComponent
extends CalibratableComponent
    OptionComponent extends ComponentMarketParamRef and provides the following methods: - Get the component's initial notional, notional, and coupon. - Get the Effective date, Maturity date, First Coupon Date. - Set the market curves - discount, TSY, forward, and Credit curves. - Retrieve the component's settlement parameters. - Value the component using standard/custom market parameters. - Retrieve the component's named measures and named measure values. - Retrieve the Underlying Fixed Income Product, Day Count, Strike, Calendar, and Manifest Measure.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
